summary: Monaghan is a hunter camp deep in the forest surrounded by elks, bears, water... simply an awesome location for a hunter.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Description updated: May 8, 2017

Please use [url=http://forum.valixx-online.de]my forum[/url] for support. Thank you.[/center]

[center][url=http://twitter.com/ValixxOnline][img]http://valixx-online.de/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/twitter-small.png[/img][/url][url=http://facebook.com/ValixxOnline][img]http://valixx-online.de/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/facebookLogo-small.png[/img][/url][/center]

[center][color=#FF0000][b]Patch 1.8.151.0.7 or greater required![/b][/color][/center]



Monaghan is a hunter camp deep in the forest surrounded by elks, bears, water... simply an awesome location for a hunter.

Everything a hunter needs is in place. Nothing fancy and not to much. If you are hunting in the forest, everyone needs a break sometimes. With this little camp you are good to go. Compatible with Frostfall.

[b]Features[/b]

1 Mannequin
2 Weapon plaques
1 Bed
1 Dresser
1 Forge
1 Pocket/Sack
2 Strong Boxes
2 Safes
1 Chest
1 Smelter
1 Tanning rack
1 Workbench
1 Cooking Pit
3 different dummys
1 bedroll
1 table
and the priceless atmosphere.



For those experiencing the "floating" grass issue, this is a Bethesda bug and has nothing to do with this mod adding anything strange. Use this little fix, found it on the official creation kit page. I had the problems to and this was the fix for me. Also, try to load [b]Monaghan Camp.esp[/b] as the last one.

Add this 4 lines to your [b]Skyrim.ini[/b] and [b]SkyrimPrefs.ini[/b]:
Note: If you have already [GRASS] in there, simply add the 3 lines starting with [b]b[/b].

[GRASS]
bAllowLoadGrass=0
bAllowCreateGrass=1
bDrawShaderGrass=1

[b]Other Mods[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31462/]Honey Moon Hall - Basement - Hideout[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33508/]Hearthfire Items Chest - Materials for building your House[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49037/]Improved Lower Hrothgar[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33637/]Sapphire Archery Necklace and Ring for Hunters[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48478/]Essential Housecarls[/url]
author: Valixx

files.name: Monaghan Camp v1_0_1
files.changelogHtml:
Spriggans removed. Hadn't seen them.
Added a chest at the foot of the bed.
Removed anvil. The forge has already one.
Instead of the anvil, i've added 2 safes, 2 strong boxes and a pocket/sack.

files.name: Monaghan Camp v1_0_2
files.changelogHtml: Fixed container chest. It is now working properly.
